pages.text: Strange Journey has a lot of food mods, and thus I'd naturally like to encourage you to make and eat these foods. Apple Pie Edition requires you to eat a diverse diet of large (typically modded) meals and maintain this diversity in order to receive varied benefits. You won't be able simply eat random small foods or eat large meals a single time.

pages.title: Benefits Only
pages.text: It's not fair to punish you for not engaging with the large and honestly overwhelming amount of food in the modpack, so there are no detriments* for ignoring it entirely. Instead, you'll be treated to a dazzling array of benefits like extra base speed, crit damage, reach, up to 20 extra health, and more.$(br)$(o)*There is a -5% random crit chance, but is just to undo a default stat change from Apothic Attributes.
